about_the_game:
When all you have is a Forklift, everything looks like palete.

Take a flight to Ghibli stylized JAPAN!
Let your forklift loose on a peacefull prefecture.

  • Travel through whole island and solve more than 30 puzzles to learn your story.

  • Some truck takes your parking place? No problem, you can forklift them!

  • Place Kei Cars on the right parking spots,

  • They can have alarms,

  • And might be Wired,

  • Be smart about parking gates,

  • Use illegal moves when no one sees, 

    But sometimes you can Help others.

Maybe they will show you how to cook Ramen?  Of course using a forklift!

Featuring:

  • An elegant forklift straight from Japan (that's you)

  • A lot of kei cars to stick on the fork,

  • A dedicated beep button (!!!)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Silly physics-based forklift game inspired by Ghibli and Japan car culture! Use your forklift skills in logic puzzles with many unexpected outcomes!
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Croatian, Cherokee, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kannada, Catalan, Kazakh, Quechua, Khmer, K'iche', Kyrgyz, Konkani, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Armenian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Kinyarwanda, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uyghur, Urdu, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Zulu, Latvian
